title: Kim Kardashian shares her first ever tweet from 2009 in honor of her True Hollywood Story special
text:
Her E! True Hollywood Story debuted on Sunday.

And in honor of the show's debut, Kim Kardashian shared her first ever tweet - from March 21, 2009.

The 38-year-old star's first tweet read: 'Hey guys it's Kim Kardashian! I finally signed up for Twitter! There are a few fakes so just know this is the real me!!!'

Iconic: Kim Kardashian shared her first ever tweet - from March 21, 2009; pictured June 20, 2017 in Los Angeles at her launch of KKW Beauty

The mother of four had tweeted on Sunday: 'I remember the day I signed up for Twitter! So crazy looking back. #TrueHollywoodStory.'

She also wrote: 'My first tweet lol #TrueHollywoodStory.'

Her original tweet, which she posted over 10 years ago, has garnered over 4,264 retweets and 8,432 likes.

During the Sunday premiere, Kim retweeted fans as they watched her episode of True Hollywood Story.

Throwback: Her E! True Hollywood Story debuted on Sunday so she shared her first tweet

Classic: Her original tweet, which she posted over 10 years ago, has garnered over 4,264 retweets and 8,432 likes

One fan had tweeted: 'Imagine telling Kim she'll never be on the cover of any magazines because she needed to be "realistic." I bet Kim truly took those words and made them her motivation because wow look how the tables turned #TrueHollywoodStory.'

Kim responded with: 'No greater motivation than someone telling you you can't achieve something. Never let anyone tell you who you are, and what you are capable of. #TrueHollywoodStory.'

Since her 2009 tweet, the star has successfully created a number of businesses including her KKW Beauty and KKW Fragrance, her shapewear and underwear line Skims, her emoji brand Kimoji and her Kim Kardashian game.

Another one: Kim recalled the day she signed up for the social media app

Real talk: Kim talked about having motivation despite people putting you down

Blast from the past: Kim responded with: 'No greater motivation than someone telling you you can't achieve something. Never let anyone tell you who you are, and what you are capable of. #TrueHollywoodStory;' pictured December 30, 2009 - the same year she opened her Twitter

On Tuesday, Kim is launching a new collection within her Skims brand; she is debuting the cotton collection, which includes bras and underwear in the fabric.

The new items are in addition to the shapewear and waist trainers she released last month.

On Monday night, during a meeting, Kim's sister Khloe Kardashian showed off her bra - which is the Skims cotton bra.

Expanding her brand: On Tuesday, Kim is launching a new collection within her Skims brand; she is debuting the cotton collection, which includes bras and underwear in the fabric

Khloe, 35, lifted up her cropped turtleneck to reveal the undergarment; she flashed her flat stomach while revealing the number.

She added black leggings with a delicate silver belt to round out her stylish ensemble.

Sister Kylie Jenner was also on hand during the meeting; the 22-year-old star wore a fitted black dress that featured a small logo along the neckline.

Stylish: On Monday night, during a meeting, Kim's sister Khloe Kardashian showed off her bra - which is the Skims cotton bra

Peek: Khloe, 35, lifted up her cropped turtleneck to reveal the undergarment; she flashed her flat stomach while revealing the number

Skims look: She added black leggings with a delicate silver belt to round out her stylish ensemble

Strike a pose: Sister Kylie Jenner was also on hand during the meeting; the 22-year-old star wore a fitted black dress that featured a small logo along the neckline

Focus: Kim shared on her Instagram stories she was up studying after she put her kids to bed

Studying: She revealed earlier this year she plans on becoming a lawyer like her late dad Robert Kardashian Sr
description: Her E! True Hollywood Story debuted on Sunday. And in honor of the show's debut, Kim Kardashian shared her first ever tweet - from March 21, 2009.
